Values that can be passed to TIMERPreScalerClkEnable as ptv so as to derive

   Pre-Scalar clock from timer clock.
#define TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_2
 
#define TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_4
 
#define TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_8
 
#define TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_16
 
#define TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_32
 
#define TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_64
 
#define TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_128
 
#define TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_256
 

Values that can be passed to TIMERModeConfigure as timerMode.

#define TIMER_ONESHOT_CMP_ENABLE   (TIMER_TCLR_CE_MASK)
 
#define TIMER_ONESHOT_NOCMP_ENABLE   (0x0000000)
 
#define TIMER_AUTORLD_CMP_ENABLE
 
#define TIMER_AUTORLD_NOCMP_ENABLE   (TIMER_TCLR_AR_MASK)
 

Values that can be passed to TIMERGPOConfigure as gpoCfg.

#define TIMER_GPO_CFG_0   (TIMER_TCLR_GPO_CFG_GPO_CFG_0)
 
#define TIMER_GPO_CFG_1
 

Values that can be passed to TIMERIntStatusClear/TIMERIntRawStatusSet/

as intFlags. Also these values can be used while checking the status got from TIMERIntRawStatusGet/TIMERIntStatusGet. Any combination is also followed. Example- (TIMER_INT_TCAR_IT_FLAG | TIMER_INT_OVF_IT_FLAG)

#define TIMER_INT_TCAR_IT_FLAG
 
#define TIMER_INT_OVF_IT_FLAG
 
#define TIMER_INT_MAT_IT_FLAG
 

Values that can be passed to TIMERIntEnable/TIMERIntDisable as intFlags.

Also these values can be used while checking the status got from TIMERIntEnableGet. Any combination is also followed. Example- (TIMER_INT_TCAR_EN_FLAG | TIMER_INT_OVF_EN_FLAG)

#define TIMER_INT_TCAR_EN_FLAG
 
#define TIMER_INT_OVF_EN_FLAG
 
#define TIMER_INT_MAT_EN_FLAG
 

Values that can be passed to TIMERWakeEnable/TIMERWakeDisable as wakeFlags.

Any combination is also followed. Example- (TIMER_WAKE_TCAR_FLAG | TIMER_WAKE_OVF_FLAG)

#define TIMER_WAKE_TCAR_FLAG
 
#define TIMER_WAKE_OVF_FLAG
 
#define TIMER_WAKE_MAT_FLAG
 

Values that can be passed to TIMERResetConfigure as rstOption.

#define TIMER_SFT_RESET_ENABLE   (TIMER_TSICR_SFT_MASK)
 
#define TIMER_SFT_RESET_DISABLE   (TIMER_TSICR_SFT_SFT_0)
 

Values that can be used while checking the status received from

TIMERIsResetDone.

#define TIMER_IS_RESET_DONE
 
#define TIMER_IS_RESET_ONGOING
 

Values that can be passed to TIMERPostedModeConfig as postMode.

#define TIMER_POSTED   (TIMER_TSICR_POSTED_MASK)
 
#define TIMER_NONPOSTED   (TIMER_TSICR_POSTED_POSTED_VALUE_0)
 

Values that can be passed to TIMERReadModeConfig as readMode.

#define TIMER_READ_MODE_POSTED   (TIMER_TSICR_READ_MODE_READ_MODE_VALUE_0)
 
#define TIMER_READ_MODE_NONPOSTED   (TIMER_TSICR_READ_MODE_READ_MODE_VALUE_1)
 

Values that can be used while checking status received from

TIMERWritePostedStatusGet API.

#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TOWR   ((uint32_t) 0x00000200U)
 
#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TOCR   ((uint32_t) 0x00000100U)
 
#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TCVR   ((uint32_t) 0x00000080U)
 
#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TNIR   ((uint32_t) 0x00000040U)
 
#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TPIR   ((uint32_t) 0x00000020U)
 
#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TMAR   ((uint32_t) TIMER_TWPS_W_PEND_TMAR_MASK)
 
#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TTGR   ((uint32_t) TIMER_TWPS_W_PEND_TTGR_MASK)
 
#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TLDR   ((uint32_t) TIMER_TWPS_W_PEND_TLDR_MASK)
 
#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TCRR   ((uint32_t) TIMER_TWPS_W_PEND_TCRR_MASK)
 
#define TIMER_WRITE_POST_TCLR   ((uint32_t) TIMER_TWPS_W_PEND_TCLR_MASK)
 

Values that can be passed to TIMERIdleModeConfigure as idleModeOption.

#define TIMER_FORCE_IDLE   (TIMER_TIOCP_CFG_IDLEMODE_IDLE_MODE_0X0)
 
#define TIMER_NO_IDLE   (TIMER_TIOCP_CFG_IDLEMODE_IDLE_MODE_0X1)
 
#define TIMER_SMART_IDLE   (TIMER_TIOCP_CFG_IDLEMODE_IDLE_MODE_0X2)
 
#define TIMER_SMART_IDLE_WAKEUP   (TIMER_TIOCP_CFG_IDLEMODE_IDLE_MODE_0X3)
 

Values that can be passed to TIMEREmuModeConfigure as emuModeOption.

#define TIMER_FROZEN   (TIMER_TIOCP_CFG_EMUFREE_TIMER_FROZEN)
 
#define TIMER_FREE   (TIMER_TIOCP_CFG_EMUFREE_TIMER_FREE)
 

Detailed Description

Function Documentation

uint32_t TIMERCompareGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Get the match register contents.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the match register contents.
int32_t TIMERCompareSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  compareVal 
)

Set the match register with the compare value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
compareValCompare value.
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
int32_t TIMERContextRestore ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const TIMERCONTEXT *  pContextPtr 
)

This API restores the context of the TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
pContextPtrPointer to the structure where the DM timer context need to be restored from.
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
int32_t TIMERContextSave ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
TIMERCONTEXT *  pContextPtr 
)

This API stores the context of the TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
pContextPtrPointer to the structure where the DM timer context need to be saved.
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
uint32_t TIMERCounterGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Get/Read the counter value from the counter register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the count value present in the Timer Counter register.
Note
: Value can be read from the counter register when the counter is stopped or when it is running.
int32_t TIMERCounterSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  counter 
)

Set/Write the Counter register with the counter value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
counterCount value for the timer.
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
Note
Value can be loaded into the counter register when the counter is stopped or when it is running.
int32_t TIMERDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will stop the timer.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
int32_t TIMEREmuModeConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  emuModeOption 
)

Configure the timer status in emulation mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
emuModeOptionEmulation mode configuration.

'emuModeOption' can take the Timer_EmuMode_Options values

Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS

int32_t TIMEREnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will start the timer.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
Note
The timer must be configured before it is started/enabled.
int32_t TIMERGetStaticRegs ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
TIMERSTATICREGS *  pStaticRegs 
)

Read the static timer registers.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
pStaticRegspointer to static registers.
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Timeout, hardware busy, retry after sometime : CSL_ETIMEOUT
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS

int32_t TIMERModeConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  timerMode 
)

This API will configure the timer in combinations of 'One Shot timer' and 'Compare' Mode or 'Auto-reload timer' and 'Compare' Mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
timerModeMode for enabling the timer timerMode can take any of the Timer_Mode_Values. any other values may set to any one of the 4 modes
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
int32_t TIMERModeConfigureGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t *  pTimerMode 
)

This API will read the value configured the timer mode in combinations of 'One Shot timer' and 'Compare' Mode or 'Auto-reload timer' and 'Compare' Mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
pTimerModePointer to timer Mode Timer_Mode_Values
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS

uint32_t TIMERReloadGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Get the reload count value from the timer load register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the value present in Timer Load Register.
int32_t TIMERReloadSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  reload 
)

Set the reload count value in the timer load register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
reloadThe reload count value of the timer.
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
Note
: It is recommended to not use reload value as 0xFFFFFFFF as it can lead to undesired results.

uint32_t  tnirVal 
)

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the 1ms Timer Module Register.
tnirValThe negative increment value
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS

uint32_t *  pTOCR 
)

int32_t TIMERTriggerSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Set/enable the trigger write access.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
Note
When we have enabled the timer in Auto-reload mode, the value from TLDR is reloaded into TCRR when a overflow condition occurs. But if we want to load the contents from TLDR to TCRR before overflow occurs then call this API.
int32_t TIMERWakeDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  wakeFlags 
)

Disable the Timer Wakeup.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
wakeFlagsVariable used to disable the Wakeup events.

'wakeFlags' can take Timer_Wake_Ctrl_Values

Returns
Success of the API
  • Success : CSL_PASS
  • Failure due to Bad Args : CSL_EBADARGS
